ModMetaData.name: Forked Multiplayer Compatibility
ModMetaData.author: notfood
ModMetaData.description: Miscellaneous patches to make Multiplayer work Mod Support: - Alpha Animals - Alpha Biomes - Animals Logic - CutPlantsBeforeBuild - Fertile Fields - Genetic Rim - RimFridge - Path Avoid - Power Switch - RimFridge - RPG Style Inventory - Run and Gun - Simple Sidearms - Sparkling Worlds - Stuffed Floors - Time of day Switch - Vanilla Cooking Expanded - Vanilla Events Expanded - Vanilla Fishing Expanded - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Farming - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security
